result.execSummary:
The defendant Brendan J Washington was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Brendan J Washington is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Brendan J Washington was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Brendan J Washington in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court grants defense motion for an adjournment.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

15RM032245  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
07-03-15
$100.00 cash previously posted, defendant to post an additional $50.00.  All other conditions of bail remain the same.

Defendant Brendan J Washington in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
BRANCH 45 for BRANCH 24.  Court addresses Justice Point violation.  Arguments heard as to bail.  Court amends cash bail.  Defense counsel requests a plea/sentencing date. Case adjourned to Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 16, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Brendan J Washington in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 24. lr  Status conference scheduled for 07-02-2015 at 01:30 pm.

15RM025812  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
05-21-15

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.
   Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription AND no dangerous weapons or firearms.
  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Brendan J Washington in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Defendant Brendan J Washington in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 16, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
